required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The TRANQUILITY Trial: Clinical Trial to Assess the Efficacy and Safety in Subjects With Dry Eye Disease
clinical_study.official_title: The TRANQUILITY Trial: Multi-Center Randomized, Double-Masked, Parallel Design, Vehicle-Controlled Phase 2/3 Clinical Trial to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of 0.25% Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution Compared to Vehicle in Subjects With Dry Eye Disease

brief_summary.textblock: The TRANQUILITY Trial: Multi-Center Randomized, Double-Masked, Parallel Design, Vehicle-Controlled Phase 2/3 Clinical Trial to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of 0.25% Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution Compared to Vehicle in Subjects with Dry Eye Disease.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Conjunctival redness assessed over 90 minutes in the dry eye chamber.
primary_outcome.description: Ora CalibraÂ® Conjunctival Redness Scale for Dry Eye (0 = Normal, 4 = Severe).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in tear RASP (reactive aldehyde species) levels.

secondary_outcome.description: Measured using a sterile Schirmer's Test Strip.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25%) administered QID over two consecutive days.
Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution administered over two consecutive days.

intervention.description: Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25%) administered over two consecutive days (Day one pre-dry eye chamber and Day two dry eye chamber assessment).
intervention.arm_group_label: Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25%) administered QID over two consecutive days.

intervention.description: Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution administered over two consecutive days (Day one pre-dry eye chamber and Day two dry eye chamber assessment).
intervention.arm_group_label: Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution administered over two consecutive days.
